mapper.sql: a.city AS "city", a.woman_num AS "womanNum", a.man_num AS "manNum", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.all_num AS "allNum"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_sex_dis( city, woman_num, man_num, longitude, latitude, all_num ) VALUES ( #{city}, #{womanNum}, #{manNum}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{allNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE login_sex_dis SET city = #{city}, woman_num = #{womanNum}, man_num = #{manNum}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, all_num = #{allNum} WHERE id = #{id}
